sections.heading: Regulations.
sections.text: [Replaced in revision byNRS 671.355.]

sections.heading: Prohibition
sections.text:
against engaging in business of money transmission without being licensed or

authorized delegate and regardless of location or method used.

sections.text:
for license: Form and medium; contents; bond or securities; financial

statement; fees and expenses; regulations; withdrawal of application.

of application for license; conduct and cost of investigation of applicant;

sections.text: and renewal of license; fees; regulations.

sections.text:
not transferable or assignable; business must be conducted at location

sections.text:
of licensees: When license required; application; fees; regulations; withdrawal

sections.text:
of Commissioner to take certain action to establish consistent licensing

between states; authority of Commissioner to participate in Nationwide

Multistate Licensing System and Registry; use of Registry for implementation of

requirements of chapter; charges for use of Registry; regulations; provisions

do not replace or affect authority of Commissioner regarding licensing.

sections.text:
of Commissioner to require submission of fingerprints; use of Nationwide

sections.text:

671.405.]

sections.text:
materials required to be submitted to Commissioner by certain persons through

required to register and maintain unique identifier with Nationwide Multistate

sections.text:
or revocation of license for failure to meet qualifications or satisfy

sections.heading: Required
sections.text:
actions of licensee before engaging in money transmission through or allowing

sections.text:
in money transmission on behalf of unlicensed or nonexempt person prohibited;

sections.text:

sections.text:
under which transaction involving money transmission is deemed to take place in

this State.

sections.text:
